text: Badshah ney poocha aey aurto! Uss waqt ka sahih waqiya kiya hai jab tum dao fareb kerkay yousuf ko uss ki dili manshah say behkana chahati thi unhon ney saaf jawab diya kay maaz Allah hum ney yousuf mein koi buraee nahi paee phir to aziz ki biwi bhi bol uthi kay abb to sachi baat nithar aaee. Mein ney hi ussay warghalaya tha uss kay ji say aur yaqeenan woh sachon mein say hai
